set_hop_linear_strain(t, beta)[source]¶

Set nearest neighbors hoppings according to the linear trixial strain.

Parameters:
  • t – Hopping value without strain.
  • beta – Strength of the strain.
get_butterfly(t, N)[source]¶

‘ Get energies depending on strain.

Parameters:
  • t – Unstrained hopping value.
  • N – number of strain values between min and max strains.
get_beta_lims()[source]¶

Get the extremal values of strain keeping positive hoppings.
